text: And I will draw near to you in judgment; and I will be a swift witness against the witches, and against the adulteresses, and against them that swear falsely by my name, and against them that keep back the hireling's wages, and them that oppress the widow, and 3. 5 Gr. beat with the fist.afflict orphans, and that wrest the judgment of the stranger, and fear not me, saith the Lord Almighty.
